name: Battle Card Arena
description:
Controls

Change Log BC1.03

Themed Decks - Two new decks with a coherent theme, each with their own seperate mechanics and gameplay styles
New Mecahnics - New mechanics for the new decks that can be viewed via the in game glossary
In Game Menu - allows you to control the music and sounds, access the glossary, concede the battle or fight on
Audio - Music and sounds added to the game
Balance Sweep - Gold generation and monster stats have all been brought into line

Change Log BC01.03

UI : Win/Lose screens & Battle Select screens added. Additional UI tweaks for visibility
CARD PREVIEW : Right clicking on a card brings up a full screen previews
ACTION : Pucks now display a small ring when they have a potential action left, which turns blue when you have selected the token
MAPS : New arenas introduced that can now be selected with an extra screen
ENEMIES : New enemies with different difficulties to now fight

NEW MECHANICS
HASTE - Creatures with haste can move the turn they are played
REGENERATION - At the end of the turn, these creatures regenerate health up to Max Health
RETALIATION - When dealt damage, these monsters attack back for a smaller amount of damage
SPAWNER - After a number of turns, a new token is spawned
MODIFY TILES - When placed, the Token converts tiles around it to allow creatures to spawn or buildings to be constructed

BUGFIXES
- Health display hover now correctly scales with screen size
- Spawned mobs now correctly display the color of their own team
- Card tints have been recolored to be more distinct
- Blue tokens should not be able to move during red turns

Change Log BC01.02

SIZE : The build size has been increased to target bigger resolutions

BUILDINGS : Buildings have now been put into the game, with new Token types, additional previews and extra effects such as gold per turn and stationary towers that can fire down on enemies.

CREATURES : New creatures have been added, bringing the total up to 10, ranging from the tiny goblin scout through to The Old Man of the forest.

TOKENS : Tokens now have a ring around them when they have possible actions remaining in the phase. This can include additional movement and attacks.

HAND : Preview a card by right clicking on it, and draw 2 cards per turn up to a hand size of 5 cards.

HOVERS : Building and HQ hover implemented to see player health
